EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314 - Q115.Follow Up No Show - Tampa
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we Missed you at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop - Tampa
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Sorry you were unable to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Tampa on January 29, 2015.
Visit run.pivotal.io <run.pivotal.io> to try Pivotal Web Services - simply upload your files and your app just works! Additionally, weâ€™ve made the workshop presentations available here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/tagged/pivotal%20cloud%20platform%20roadshow> so you can catch up on what you missed.
Interested in learning more about what Pivotal CF can do for your organization? <http://info.pivotal.io/c000208I0NAU06CJm0v6b00>Contact us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team.
We are look forward to seeing you at a future event.
The Pivotal Team
